# Genetic Analysis using R Programming Language

A project to analyze genetic data using R programming language. I am going to use packages named BiocManager (>= 1.30.16), SNPstats, and ggplot2 for this project.

## Getting Started

These instructions will get you a copy of the project up and running on your local machine for development and testing purposes.

### Prerequisites and Installing

What things you need to install the software and how to install them

```
R
RStudio
```

### Installing Packages

```
install.packages('BiocManager')
install.packages('snpStats')
install.packages('ggplot2')
```

## Running the tests

```
library(BiocManager)
library(snpStats)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Built With

* [R](https://www.r-project.org/) - The R Project for Statistical Computing
* [PyCharms](https://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/) - Python IDE for Professional Developers
